i1.name: A Harmless Scarecrow
description: {{sbc|Innate - Scarecrow Effigy:}} '''Fiddlesticks''' begins the game with an exclusive {{ii|Scarecrow Effigy}}, which permanently occupies the [[Trinket item|trinket]] slot. '''Fiddlesticks''' can pretend to be an ''Effigy'', after standing still for 2 seconds, adjusting its body into a scarecrow and extending its arm out to expose its lantern. Its [[health bar]] is also hidden to enemies while idle, similarly to an ''Effigy''. However, casting {{ai|Crowstorm|Fiddlesticks}} will cancel it early.

{{sbc|Innate - A Harmless Scarecrow:}} From [[Experience (champion)|level]] 6 onward, placing an {{tip|Effigy}} also summons a demonic eyeball at the location that grants {{tip|obscured vision}} of enemy units that are not {{tip|sight|visible}} in the area for 6 seconds while also {{tip|true sight|revealing}} and {{tip|disabled ward|disabling}} enemy {{tip|ward|wards}} and {{tip|stealthed trap|stealthed traps}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate - Scarecrow Effigy: Fiddlesticks begins the game with an exclusive The item: Scarecrow Effigy, which permanently occupies the Trinket item slot. Fiddlesticks can pretend to be an Effigy, after standing still for 2 seconds, adjusting its body into a scarecrow and extending its arm out to expose its lantern. Its health bar is also hidden to enemies while idle, similarly to an Effigy. However, casting Crowstorm will cancel it early.Innate - A Harmless Scarecrow: From Experience (champion) 6 onward, placing an Effigy also summons a demonic eyeball at the location that grants obscured vision of enemy units that are not visible in the area for 6 seconds while also revealing and disabling enemy wards and stealthed traps.
i1.notes:
* ''Effigies'' will mimic '''Fiddlesticks' ''' idle animations and have their [[health bar]] hidden until they fake an action.
** If '''Fiddlesticks''' pretends to be an ''effigy'', the health bar stays hidden until the animation is interrupted or it takes damage. The health bar will come back into view immediately but will instantly vanish if '''Fiddlesticks''' remains idle the moment it stops taking damage.
*** {{tip|Channel|Channeling}} a spell interrupts the pose and does not activate it either.
**** The pose is special cased to only be interrupted by {{ais|Bountiful Harvest|Fiddlesticks}} cast once the tethers are applied.
* Effigies are considered {{tip|clone|clones}}.
** They are not valid targets to [[direction-targeted|direction]], [[ground-targeted|ground]], and [[auto-targeted]] effects for first {{tt|{{fd|1.5}} seconds|Estimated}} of their lifespan.
* The trinket slot can still be temporarily replaced by {{ii|Eye of the Herald}}.
* [[File:A Harmless Scarecrow Surprise Party.png|30px|border]] - {{csl|Fiddlesticks|Surprise Party}} has a special icon for this ability.

q1.name: Terrify
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While '''Fiddlesticks''' has been [[combat status|out of combat]] for at least {{tt|{{fd|2.5}} seconds|Estimated}} and is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to the enemy team, or is pretending to be an {{ai|A Harmless Scarecrow|Fiddlesticks|Effigy}}, '''Fiddlesticks'''' next damaging ability {{tip|fear|fears}} all targets struck.
Targets feared by '''Fiddlesticks''' are placed on a cooldown equal to ''Terrify's'' cooldown, during which they cannot be feared by it again.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiddlesticks''' screeches at the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|fear|fearing}} them. This has a minimum damage threshold and is capped at 400 against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
Against targets with a cooldown, ''Terrify'' instead will have its {{ccs|damage|magic}} and minimum threshold doubled.
{{tip|minion|Minions}} are always feared if '''Fiddlesticks''' is not attacking them and there is no enemy champion in its view.
q1.descriptionHtml: Passive: While Fiddlesticks has been combat status for at least 2.5 seconds and is not visible to the enemy team, or is pretending to be an Effigy, Fiddlesticks' next damaging ability fears all targets struck.Targets feared by Fiddlesticks are placed on a cooldown equal to Terrify's cooldown, during which they cannot be feared by it again.Active: Fiddlesticks screeches at the target enemy, dealing magic damage and fearing them. This has a minimum damage threshold and is capped at 400 against monsters.Against targets with a cooldown, Terrify instead will have its Unknown value: ccs damage magic and minimum threshold doubled.Minions are always feared if Fiddlesticks is not attacking them and there is no enemy champion in its view.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|6 to 10}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''current''' health}}|Minimum Damage|{{ap|40 to 120}}}}
{{st|Increased Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|6*2 to 10*2}}% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''current''' health}}|Increased Minimum Damage|{{ap|40*2 to 120*2}}}}
q1.notes:
* The fear-immunity timer is not refreshed by subsequent attempts to fear the target.
* The {{tip|fear}} is applied {{tt|at the end of the cast time|0.363 seconds after the start of cast, due game tick rate}}, regardless of the target's distance or the missile landing.
** The missile cannot be destroyed, either.
* '''Fiddlesticks''' is considered "seen" if it is visible and is inside an enemy champion's {{tt|sight radius|1350 units}}. Vision from {{tip|minion|minions}}, {{tip|ward|wards}}, and {{tip|turret|turrets}} will not prevent '''Fiddlesticks''' from {{tip|flee|fearing}} if there are no nearby enemy champions.
** There is a very brief grace period after being seen but not when entering combat.
* {{tip|Monster|Monsters}} may be feared with the same condition as champions.
** Vision from the enemy team will not prevent the fear from triggering versus neutral monsters, and vice versa. 
* The passive portion does not currently communicate any information to '''Fiddlesticks''', its allies nor its enemies. There is no indicator to say that '''Fiddlesticks''' is out of combat; and no indicator or debuff icon on affected enemies.
** A visual indicator will circle around all enemy champions while '''Fiddlesticks''' is channeling {{ai|Crowstorm|Fiddlesticks}} if it is unseen. This is only visible to '''Fiddlesticks'''.
* The fear immunity applies even if the target is {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}}. It is not applied if it is blocked by {{tip|spell shield}}.
* ''Terrify'' will still cast and affect the target even if '''Fiddlesticks''' dies or loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time.
** ''Terrify'' will still cast but not affect the target if they die or become {{tip|untargetable}} during the cast time. There is no compensation.
* The [[summoner|player's]] screen will have a visual effect when successfully {{tip|flee|feared}} by ''Terrify''.
* [[File:Terrify Surprise Party.png|30px|border]] - {{csl|Fiddlesticks|Surprise Party}} has a special icon for this ability.

w1.name: Bountiful Harvest
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiddlesticks''' forms a {{tip|tether}} between itself and each nearby enemy over the cast time, then {{tip|channel|channels}} and {{tip|sight|reveals}} itself for up to 2 seconds, harvesting the souls of tethered targets.

While '''Fiddlesticks''' is channeling, tethered enemies are {{tip|true sight|revealed}} and dealt {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, with the last tick dealing additional {{as|magic damage}}. '''Total''' damage is reduced to 50% against {{tip|minions|minions}}.
'''Fiddlesticks''' {{tip|heals}} itself for a percentage of the {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage dealt before modifiers}} dealt, reduced to 15% against minions.

''Bountiful Harvest'' ends if all targets have died or broken their tethers. If the channel was not {{tt|interrupted|e.g. by Fiddlesticks or crowd control effects}}, 60% of the remaining {{sti|cooldown}} is refunded.
''A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability. '''Fiddlesticks''' does not need {{tip|sight}} of a target to tether itself to them.''
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Fiddlesticks forms a tether between itself and each nearby enemy over the cast time, then channels and reveals itself for up to 2 seconds, harvesting the souls of tethered targets.While Fiddlesticks is channeling, tethered enemies are revealed and dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds, with the last tick dealing additional magic damage. Total damage is reduced to 50% against minions.Fiddlesticks heals itself for a percentage of the pre-mitigation damage dealt, reduced to 15% against minions.Bountiful Harvest ends if all targets have died or broken their tethers. If the channel was not interrupted, 60% of the remaining cooldown is refunded.A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability. Fiddlesticks does not need sight of a target to tether itself to them.
leveling: {{st|Damage per Tick|{{ap|60*0.25 to 180*0.25}} {{as|(+ {{fd|8.75}}% AP)}}|Last Tick of Damage|{{ap|60*0.25 to 180*0.25}} {{as|(+ {{fd|8.75}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|12 to 22}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|60*2 to 180*2}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|12 to 22}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the tether's application but not the damage of one already applied.
* {{Pending for test}}: [[Spell effects]] ({{tip|persistent area damage}} or {{tip|persistent damage}}?)
* [[File:Bountiful Harvest Surprise Party.png|30px|border]] - {{csl|Fiddlesticks|Surprise Party}} has a special icon for this ability.

e1.name: Reap
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiddlesticks''' slashes all enemies in the target area with its scythe, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
Enemies hit in the center of the area are also {{tip|silence|silenced}} for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Fiddlesticks slashes all enemies in the target area with its scythe, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit for 1.25 seconds.Enemies hit in the center of the area are also silenced for 1.25 seconds.
e1.notes: * [[File:Reap Surprise Party.png|30px|border]] - {{csl|Fiddlesticks|Surprise Party}} has a special icon for this ability.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)

  • Slow: %

r1.name: Crowstorm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{tip|channel|channeling}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, '''Fiddlesticks''' {{tip|blink|blinks}} to the target location with a murder of crows flying wildly around it for 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: After channeling for 1.5 seconds, Fiddlesticks blinks to the target location with a murder of crows flying wildly around it for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies every 0.25 seconds.
r1.notes:
* {{tip|Root|Roots}} do not {{tip|interrupt}} the ability despite being a [[Channel#Movement Channels|movement channel]].
* ''Crowstorm'', after it has been channeled, persists through {{tip|stasis}}.
* '''Fiddlesticks''' will always {{tip|blink}} to its intended location even if its position changes during the {{tip|channel}} without being interrupted (e.g. by {{ai|Realm Warp|Ryze}}).
* [[File:Crowstorm Surprise Party.png|30px|border]] - {{csl|Fiddlesticks|Surprise Party}} has a special icon for this ability.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Fiddlesticks''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|cast=false|move=false|items=false, true|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=death, silence, ground}}
